section.name: What is External Java Code Formatters for NetBeans?
section.p:
This is the project page of the NetBeans IDE plugin External Java Code Formatters for NetBeans. This plugin adds the possibility to use third-party Java Code Formatters (as for now the
Eclipse Java Code Formatter and the Google Java Code Formatter) inside the NetBeans IDE. This plugin helps you to apply to a common code style in a team of Eclipse JDT and NetBeans IDE users.
